scripts.deploy: rm -rf sequelize-meta.json && node create-app-yaml.js && time gcloud app deploy --stop-previous-version --promote
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production npm run db:migrate && NODE_ENV=production npm run application
scripts.build:scripts: npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && npm run bundle:scripts
scripts.watch:scripts: npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run compile:scripts:watch & npm run copy:files:watch & npm run bundle:scripts:watch)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run bundle:scripts & npm run build:styles)
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run compile:scripts:watch & npm run copy:files:watch & npm run bundle:scripts:watch & npm run watch:styles)
scripts.application: npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run bundle:scripts & npm run build:styles & npm run server)
scripts.application:watch: npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run compile:scripts:watch & npm run copy:files:watch & npm run bundle:scripts:watch & npm run watch:styles & npm run server:watch)
scripts.lint: npm run lint:scripts && npm run lint:styles
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:scripts:fix && npm run lint:styles
